name: Study Edge
long_description: Study Edge is a leading education company that develops and distributes customized content (primarily video) for courses at the middle-school, high-school, and collegiate levels, in partnership with universities, state education agencies, and other institutions.
one_liner: Middle school to college education through web, mobile, and VR

name: Crowdery
long_description:
Crowdery is an online platform, allowing its users to vote on their favorite product design out of a set. It then builds its users a personalized marketplace of their top picks, and top products are opened for them to pre-order at a discount.

Crowdery was launched in 2013 by Maran Nelson and Aditya Viswanathan. It is based in Mountain View, C.A.
one_liner: [Now Clara, YC S14- claralabs.com]

name: CodeCombat
long_description:
CodeCombat is a multiplayer programming game for learning how to code. With thousands of schools and millions of students, we are bringing K12 computer science education to everyone, regardless of gender, race, or background. Everyone should have the opportunity to learn.

The ultimate goal of CodeCombat is to bring more users into the field of computer programming by making the logic and syntax more accessible and enjoyable to learn. The end game is to educate a whole new generation of computer programmers that started their journey by slaying ogres and defending their castles from oncoming enemy hordes.

We teach Python, JavaScript, and other languages directly in the browser. Teachers with no computer science background can get started in five minutes. In a world where all programmers have had to be second-language learners, do you want your students to become native speakers of code? Let's chat about bringing CodeCombat to your school!

Find us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/CodeCombat
one_liner: Game that teaches computer science to middle and high school kids.

name: Platzi
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Santiago, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile; Mexico City, CDMX, Mexico; Madrid, Community of Madrid, Spain; Buenos Aires, CABA, Argentina; BogotÃ¡, Bogota, Colombia; Lima, Callao Region, Peru; Remote
long_description:
Platzi cracked online education. It teaches courses on design, marketing and programming with a 70% completion rate, to over one million students worldwide.

The classes include real-time collaboration among students and industry leaders as teachers. It aims to be the professional home for lifelong learning of advanced skills.
one_liner: Latin America's School of Technology

name: Leada
long_description:
Leada offers a data training program that companies utilize to on-board their employees in the company's data.

The data training program enables professionals to understand how to answer the common business questions they face in their role using their BI tool, SQL, R, or Python.
one_liner: Online enterprise training in data science and analytics.â€¦

name: Go1
long_description: In todayâ€™s environment, employees need training to ensure business compliance, skill development and to support an engaged workforce. Go1 brings together content from the worldâ€™s top training providers and makes it easy to access in whichever platform your organization uses. This makes it easier to deliver, manage and engage with training. Go1 also works with existing LMS, HRIS, and business systems to make learning simpler and more effective.
one_liner: A learning platform that enables you to train your staff or customers.

name: Jumpcut
long_description: We help aspiring creators go viral and monetize their content.
one_liner: Helping creators go viral and build businesses.

name: Extern
long_description:
At Extern, weâ€™re solving the experience gap.  Extern created the remote Externship, a skill-building work experience that is easier for students to access, and easier for companies to run, than an internship.  Our mission is to help anyone discover and launch their career through professional experiences available anywhere at any time.  Since 2020, weâ€™ve created and powered Externships for over 50,000 students on behalf of companies from Fortune 500s to startups.  

After spending $100K on average for a 4-year degree, graduates find that almost 40% of entry level jobs on Linkedin required 3+ years of work experience. Internships are how many college students get this kind of experience, but the demand for good internships outstrips the supply. Internship programs are difficult to scale, they favor students who already have social capital, and theyâ€™re time-consuming for employers to run.

Externships are short, online, project-based work experiences that employers can offer to hundreds of students using less resource and employee time than it would take to support an intern.  Extern makes the complex process of running an Externship completely turnkey with software and industry experts which in turn makes professional experience more accessible to more students.

By making work experience more accessible, Extern is driving the rapid mobility and upskilling needed for a new economy.  We envision a world where anyone can access work experience as a form of education â€“ no matter their background, experience, or socio-economic status.  Come join our movement to reshape work, education, and credentialing for future generations with the Externship.

Extern was born out of a pivot from Paragon One (W17) which initially focused on providing students with a career center-as-a-service platform, connecting them with industry professionals to receive career coaching and guidance.  Backed by Y Combinator, Foundation Capital, Launch Fund, University Ventures, and Learn Capital.
one_liner: Professional Experience Anytime, Anywhere.

name: Mystery.org
long_description:
We started Mystery.org to create better explanations for every question children have about the world. We began with the 150 most common science questions that children ask teachers. We call this collection Mystery Science. Last year, more than 4 million children used Mystery Science in 50% of U.S. elementary schools. In an industry that is plagued by long sales cycles and high barriers to entry, weâ€™ve sold thousands of schools without a single sales person. Weâ€™re backed by a great group of investors including Y Combinator, Learn Capital, and Reach Capital.

Weâ€™re now moving on to all the other questions children have that theyâ€™ll never learn in school. In the last 18 months we received over 500,000 questions from children eager for better explanations of the world.  Now weâ€™re creating video explanations for every question. You can think of this like a visual Wikipedia for kids.

Our goal is to create a generation of better thinkers. We think this is the most important problem to solve in the world today.
one_liner: We help kids stay curious by creating better explanations.

name: Eduflow
long_description: Eduflow is a tool for running active online learning experiences. We are used at thousands of institutions around the world all the way from middle school to corporate training at Google. We believe that digital tools for learning need to be more than just a playlist of videos. We're building learning activities that instructors can use to engage learners and make them active participants in their own learning process.
one_liner: Create and run collaborative online learning experiences.

name: Edwin
long_description:
It combines the latest adaptive learning and Natural Language Understanding technology with pedagogical content as well as on-demand human instructors to offer its students affordable, personalized, 1:1 learning. Based in San Francisco, the company was funded by General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Google Assistant Investments Program, and several other investors. Over 800 thousand students have improved their English with Edwin.

In early 2020 Edwin merged with MyBuddy.ai. The resulting company kept the name â€œBuddy.aiâ€. Headquartered in San Francisco, it focuses on building a virtual English conversation partner for over 500 million children around the globe who are trying to learn English, but can't reach fluency because they lack genuine practice speaking the language. The company doubled down on its mobile app Buddy, the voice-based English tutor for kids, organically combining solutions developed by Buddy.ai and Edwin.
one_liner: Edwin is virtual English tutor - an AI-powered service for learningâ€¦

name: Acely
long_description:
Acely is the leading AI tutor for the digital SAT and ACT, helping students get into their dream college. Our mission is to democratize opportunity for high school families through AI-native tools that empower students to learn smarter and gain confidence.

Backed by Forerunner Ventures, we've grown to $10M ARR with a lean, 10-person team, proof that small, mission-driven teams can deliver outsized impact. Our product has traction, our users are engaged, and we're now at an inflection point: ready to scale with speed, craft, and AI-native excellence.

Acely was launched out of beta in January 2024 as a spinout product from Juni (YC W18).
one_liner: Every student's AI coach for college readiness

name: UBITS
all_locations: BogotÃ¡, Bogota, Colombia; Santiago, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile; Mexico City, CDMX, Mexico; Lima, Callao Region, Peru; Panama City, Panama, Panama; Remote
long_description: We help Spanish-speaking companies create, execute and measure their online learning strategy. We offer more than 5.000 courses across three categories: Soft skills, business, and tech skills.
one_liner: Learning Hub for companies in Latam

name: Flockjay
long_description: Flockjay is an AI-powered platform for sales teams looking to get the knowledge they need, when they need it, to close more deals. We combine learning, content, and performance management in one place, so teams can effectively share best practices, coach faster and more effectively, and drive faster onboarding and productivity times.
one_liner: AI-driven learning, content, and coaching for sales teams

name: Skill-lync
long_description: Skill-Lync provides job leading engineering education online. We started with a special focus in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics, Civil & Computer Science engineering and have become one of the world's leading & highest rated platforms in teaching high-end technical skills that help students get a job.
one_liner: Online engineering college for India. Learn technical skills & getâ€¦

name: StayQrious
long_description: Imagine doing personalised workouts with a fitness coach, but for school subjects. Students log into their session that has been scheduled with their coach, they can see their learning workout for the day. Their workout typically consists of watching an interactive video, writing explanations, giving feedback to other students, making an explainer video etc. They get constant feedback and encouragement from the coach and progress only after they have understood the pre-requisites.
one_liner: StayQrious helps kids in India learn through online group classes,â€¦

name: EduRev
long_description:
EduRev is like a Netflix for Education with a layer of social networking. We want to make the process of education and learning so good that you (and your kids) donâ€™t feel the need to go to a school/college/coaching. EduRev stands for Education Revolution and we are looking to achieve nothing less. 

EduRev has over 7 million students and adds around 10 new users each minute. We are backed by the iconic American VC Y Combinator, Artiman Ventures and even angel investors like Anand Chandrashekaran, Austen Allred, Martin Basiri to name a few. 

We won the Best App award (for learning) by Google, mBillionth award by Bill and Melinda Gates, and even won Startup of the Year by TieCon.

Android App: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.edurev
Website: http://edurev.in/
iOS App (beta): https://apps.apple.com/in/app/edurev/id1529835494
one_liner: Learning App for 400M Indian Students like a Netflix for Education

name: Arist
long_description:
Arist is the only message-based learning platform. 

We help over 10% Fortune 500 companies and governments rapidly teach and train employees, entirely via messaging tools like SMS, Slack, WhatsApp and Microsoft Teams.
one_liner: Deliver effective learning at scale

name: Scrimba
long_description: Scrimba is a coding course platform with over 120K monthly active students. It's based on a new video format that makes the screencasts fully interactive for students, and easier to create for teachers. Our vision is to create a coding school that has the quality of Stanford but the price of a gym membership.
one_liner: We turn people into hireable devs for 1% of the price of codeâ€¦

name: Virtually
long_description: The first ever "Student Relationship Manager" for online schools to bridge the gap between educators and students. Track attendance on Zoom, send reminders, and more.
one_liner: The "Shopify" for Online Schools

name: Spokn
long_description:
Spokn makes it easy for People and Comms teams to make videos starring their own employees and leaders - no editing skills or special equipment necessary.  In minutes, you can create videos that feel as engaging as TikTok, and share them anywhere: Slack/Teams, your LMS, intranet, careers page, or job offer emails.  

Companies like InterContinental Hotels, Coinbase, Twilio, Opendoor, Udemy, SiriusXM, Gong and more use Spokn to create engaging videos for their learning & development, internal comms, recognition, DEI and employer branding.
one_liner: AI-powered video platform for Internal Comms and HR teams

name: Pragmatic Leaders (Ankai Inc)
long_description:
Ostronaut is an AI-powered, SaaS-based corporate training solution built to transform workforce learning. Its foundations come from six years of training 10,000+ product professionals through Pragmatic Leaders, which provided a faster, more cost-effective alternative to an MBA.

ðŸš€ Smarter, faster, and designed for real-world impact.

- Initiative of Pragmatic Leaders
one_liner: AI-powered Corporate Training: Faster, Smarter, and More Effective

name: FunctionUp (FanPlay)
long_description: A technical placement bootcamp in the Income Sharing Model. We train top tech talent with 0 upfront fee and place them across our partner companies. Also our program has a deep social impact. We  provide special assistance to women and unemployed youth in India- both economically and socially.
one_liner: A skill-tech platform that runs placement bootcamps

name: Coderhouse
long_description:
A web app that offers live online courses in programming, design, data, online marketing and more.

Our courses are nearly as affordable as online Moocs (~$40 a month) and as effective as Bootcamps. We achieve this by running 100 person live classes with one expert professor and one mentor per 15 students. Every class, students need to turn in assignments that are corrected by their mentors and at the end of the course they need to turn in and approve a final project. We also help our selected students with careers services such as mockup interviews, Linkedin enhancement, and more. All of this creates a level of accountability that allows us to achieve really low churn levels (<9%).

Our career tracks last between 9-11 months and we give our selected students their money back in case they don't get a job 6 months after they are done with the course.
one_liner: Effective and accessible online live education.

name: Codingal
long_description:
Codingal (www.codingal.com) is the global leader in online AI and coding education for kids and teens (Grades 1-12). Our mission is to help students fall in love with AI & coding and become creators of the future - entrepreneurs, engineers, and scientists by providing high-quality, accessible, and personalized computer science education.

In many countries, top technical universities exist, but thereâ€™s a significant gap in K-12 programming education. Parents want their kids to start learning programming early, and thatâ€™s why they choose Codingal. We offer live, interactive classes with expert instructors from Computer Science backgrounds. All our instructors are rigorously vetted and trained to ensure a high-quality learning experience.

Every student receives a personalized learning path tailored to their age and skill level. Our curriculum is STEM.org-accredited, aligned with the Kâ€“12 Computer Science Framework, and delivered in 1:1 and small-group formats, ensuring individual attention and engagement.

Students learn by building real-world projects using popular tools and technologies like Scratch, Python, Roblox, Minecraft, MIT App Inventor, Thunkable, Pygame, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, website development, Java, Data Science, AP Computer Science content, and AI tools like ChatGPT and Machine Learning frameworks. Through this hands-on approach, students create apps, games, animations, and websites in a fun, engaging way that fosters problem-solving and creative skills.

Beyond classes, students participate in global coding competitions, hackathons like HPE CodeWars, and online coding camps, further nurturing their creativity, confidence, and innovative spirit. With a 4.9/5 student rating and NPS of 86, Codingal is trusted by over 1 million registered students in 70+ countries.

Codingal combines the best of human instruction and AI-driven learning to inspire the next generation of tech leaders. We are poised to lead the next generation of coding education and make a significant impact in this rapidly growing market.
one_liner: Leading online after-school for kids & teens to learn AI & coding

name: Unschool
long_description: Unschool provides real-world professional education that colleges in India do not provide. We are a marketplace where college students in India can learn about technology, management and arts from high-quality courses created by experts from around the world.
one_liner: Learn, Intern and become Industry-Ready

name: Prendea
long_description: Prendea offers live afterschool classes to Spanish-speaking kids ages 4 to 15.  For a fixed monthly price, kids can choose as many classes as they like from our large selection that ranges from TikTok choreography to astronomy.
one_liner: Live afterschool classes for Spanish-speaking kids ages 4 to 15.

name: Kidato
long_description: Parents in Africa face either public schools with student-teacher ratios as high as 50:1 or private schools with tuition fees as high as $7500 per year, per child. Kidato classes have student-teacher ratios of 5:1 and teach the same rigorous international curriculum as other private schools â€” but at a fraction of the price. In our second semester, Kidato has enrolled more than 30 students into our learning-from-home program as a replacement for brick-and-mortar schools. We expect to triple this enrollment by our third semester.
one_liner: Online school for K12 education in Africa

name: Poliglota
long_description:
Poliglota is the online language school for Latam, where group classes are led by an instructor. Over 12,000 students have paid us $500 to learn english in order to get a higher income.
We offer an online service of personalized language sessions with small groups of people of the same level, guided by expert language coaches that we train in our social methodology.
one_liner: The online language school for Latam, with groups led by an instructor

name: Awari
long_description: We're replacing masters degrees in Brazil with cohort-based courses for top talent to advance their careers in tech. The programs incorporate hands-on learning with sessions led by experts from high-profile companies like Rappi, Nubank, Apple, Google, and more.
one_liner: Reinventing lifelong learning for the future of work.

name: Avion School
one_liner: We teach Filipinos to become remote software engineers globally.

name: Kiwify
long_description:
Kiwify enables anyone to create and sell their online course in Brazil.
We provide payment processing, video streaming and student management
one_liner: Create & sell online courses

name: AlgoUniversity
long_description:
We are building live teaching infrastructure that enables handful of top educators (from Google, Facebook, etc) to coach a large number of students.
We train college students in a year-long live cohorts and they pay us a portion of their salary as fees once they get a tech job (Income Sharing Agreement)
one_liner: Building Job driven Virtual Tech University for India ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³

name: Kurios
all_locations: Lima, Callao Region, Peru; Lima, Lima Province, Peru
long_description:
Kurios is cohort based online courses for professionals in Latin America. Our instructors are professionals coming out of tech companies like Google, Amazon, Stripe and more. 

Our course completion rate is 90% and annual customer retention rate is 100%.

We have 65 B2B customers and we up-skill their employees in product management, growth and data analytics, just to start with.

Some customers: Walmart Mexico, Banorte (2nd bank in Mexico), Mercado Libre, BCP (#1 bank in Peru), Alicorp (leading CPG in Latam), Sura (leading pension fund), etc.
one_liner: Cohort-based online courses for professionals in Latin America

name: KaiPod Learning
long_description:
KaiPod Learning is a national network of microschools bringing school choice to every community in America. We work with education entrepreneurs to start high-quality microschools to better serve students and their families.

As more families stand up for choice in education and as more educators look for alternative career pathways, KaiPod Learning is helping bring microschools into the mainstream.
one_liner: A national network of microschools bringing school choice to everyâ€¦

name: Spark Studio
long_description:
Meet Sparky, a fun and quirky AI buddy in the avatar of a friendly fox who kids can just speak with to build fluency and confidence with English speaking. 
Powered by Generative AI, and made magical with child-appropriate experience, features and topics, Sparky brings a whole world of knowledge and a judgement-free environment for kids to become comfortable with speaking English. 

142 countries (outside English dominant countries) mandate English learning as part of the national education policy. These kids have exposure to English but feel underconfident and embarrassed to speak. The biggest problem across the classes and books they get, is the lack of real conversational practice. With AI, we're making this affordable accessible and enjoyable for kids across the world. 

We're a passionate team of educators with over 30 years of combined experience in building education products for kids and have held leadership positions are India's biggest education companies - Byju's and LEAD.
one_liner: The most magical personal Voice-Led AI English Learning Buddy for Kids

name: Female Invest
all_locations: Copenhagen, Denmark; London, England, United Kingdom
long_description:
Female Invest is on a mission to close the financial gender gap. By creating a safe space and a trusted source for knowledge, weâ€™re democratising investing for everyone globally. 

Weâ€™ve supported more than half a million women across 100 countries with our services. This makes us the world's largest univers combining financial learning and community. 

Currently, we make $5.2 million in ARR from approx. 43.000 paying users. 92% of our users are on a yearly plan, and average churn is 2.4% in the last 3 months. Our unit economics are best in class and consistently improving .

Weâ€™ve raised approximately $12 million in seed funding from prominent investors across the EU and US and are soon ready to raise our Series A, where we are aiming to close an additional $10-15 million. The company operates within FinTech, EdTech and Investing. 

In 2022, Female Invest did its first acquisition by acquiring the Danish investing platform, GAIA Technologies A/S. 

The companyâ€™s headquarter is located in Copenhagen and has a smaller office in London.

Download our app to get the full experience.
one_liner: Female Invest is a social e-learning app for finance and investing

name: Filadd
long_description:
We provide premium, personalized courses for college entrance exams (like Chileâ€™s PAES and Brazilâ€™s ENEM) combining engaging video lessons, live tutoring, AI-powered study plans, and downloadable resources.
Today we serve over 25,000 students annually across Chile, Brazil, Argentina, and Colombia, with a 90% YoY growth and industry-leading margins.
one_liner: We help students in Latin America graduate from College.

name: Novatr
all_locations: Gurugram, HR, India; Delhi, DL, India
long_description:
Novatr (YC S21) offers online cohort-based courses for architects, engineers and designers in the AEC industry to advance their professional growth. We serve learners from 45+ countries including India, MENA, USA, Europe, and SEA. Our courses are delivered by professionals from global firms like Autodesk, BIG, Google, UNStudio, AECOM, and graduates are placed at top-tier architecture firms, construction companies and real estate companies.

Project-based learning and peer-to-peer interaction in cohort makes learning enriching and increases the completion rates to 84%. Learners work in groups of 2-6 on live projects and create significant outputs from scratch.

The company is led by alumni of SPA Delhi and IIT Madras.
one_liner: Online cohort based courses for architects, engineers and designersâ€¦

name: Stepful
long_description: Stepful trains people with a high school education in 4 months and places them into healthcare jobs. Healthcare is the fastest growing industry in the US accounting for 40% of all jobs added including medical assistants, nursing assistants, and phlebotomists.
one_liner: Online Training for Healthcare Jobs

name: Hyperbeam
long_description:
Emebedding third-party apps and websites can often be a nightmare due to incompatible platforms, security issues, and poor UX. Adding multiplayer functionality to these embeds makes this problem exponentially more difficult.

Enter Hyperbeamâ€”an API that lets you embed virtual computers anywhere, including web, mobile, VR, and even VSCode. You can then open any third-party website or application, synchronize audio and video flawlessly among multiple participants, and add multi-user control with just a few lines of code. Uses cases and customer segments include remote learning, virtual offices, online casinos, productivity, watch parties and more.

We are three technical founders from the University of Waterloo, and worked as engineers at Facebook, Yahoo, and Lyft. Our technology is battle-testedâ€“we currently stream over 1.25M hours of video per month across every continent. https://hyperbeam.com?ch=yc
one_liner: API for shared embeddable web browsers

name: MySivi
long_description:
MySivi is an AI-powered English learning app.

Learn English Speaking The Fastest Way (AI + Human) ðŸ˜€
Practicing with AI English Tutor and Human is the fastest way to learn to speak. Try now to feel the change within a week.
one_liner: MySivi - AI English Speaking Practice App

name: AntWalk
long_description:
An up-skilling platform that empowers teams with continuous learning tracks to equip them with the right skills at the right time. 

Our up-skilling programs are customised to business objectives of organisations across sales, customer success, general management, technology & product functions & promote employee development by enhancing their existing competencies and developing newer ones. 

AntWalk is powered by 3000+ Experts from 500+ Global Brands across 40+ Countries to power these courses and 1:1 Interactions.
one_liner: An employee up-skilling platform for fast growing companies

name: Darsel
long_description: Darsel is a AI-powered math education chatbot which is designed to supplement K12 education systems in resource-constrained environments. Darsel allows students to practice math questions & do their homework through platforms like SMS, WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger.
one_liner: Chatbot teaching K12 math in developing countries

name: CodeCrafters
long_description: Build your own Git, Docker, Redis, SQLite â€”Â in Go, Rust, Python, etc.

name: Pair AI
long_description: Pair AI is Shopify for knowledge products. We empower creators, educators, and experts to launch addicting mobile-first video courses and provide AI-assisted coaching services at scale. Our platform is a one-stop shop to seamlessly monetize what you know! We make learning as fun and engaging as watching a TikTok.
one_liner: Reimagining education with short form video and AI

name: GoodCourse
long_description: GoodCourse is the TikTok-style corporate learning platform achieving 10x better completion rates, training employees on topics like compliance and inclusion.
one_liner: The TikTok style corporate training platform

name: Read Bean
long_description: Read Bean helps intermediate-advanced language learners and heritage speakers improve their literacy using real-world content. The app measures your initial reading level and automatically transforms texts into bite-sized lessons at your level. It adapts to your progress, reinforcing vocabulary and tailoring content to ensure continuous improvement.
one_liner: Learn language with real-world content, at your level
